PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Recently , to further lower the bandgap of PCDTBT without sacrificing its high V OC , Hsu et al.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value            |
|--------------------------|
| bandgap of PCDTBT        |
| V OC (Voltage Overload Capacity) |
| sacrificing its high V OC |
| further lower the bandgap |
| without sacrificing its high V OC |
| Hsu et al. |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value            |
|--------------------------|
| bandgap of PCDTBT        |
| high V OC (Voltage Overload Capacity) |
| further lower the bandgap |
| without sacrificing its high V OC |
| Hsu et al. |

Note: "bandgap" and "Voltage Overload Capacity" are the material properties referred to in the paragraph. "Further lower" and "without sacrificing" are not properties but actions or conditions related to the properties. "PCDTBT" is a type of material. "Hsu et al." are researchers.
